TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuditLogLocation extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: セキュリティ関連のイベント ログが書き込まれる場所を指定します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 When creating a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] application that requires authentication and\/or authorization of callers, you can specify that events related to security be recorded for either success, failure, or both. The location of the log is determined by this enumeration.
The level of the audit log is specified by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.MessageAuthenticationAuditLevel%2A> or the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.ServiceAuthorizationAuditLevel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior> class to one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLevel> values.
You can also specify audit behavior using the [serviceSecurityAudit element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/ba517369-a034-4f8e-a2c4-66517716062b) binding.
> [!IMPORTANT] > If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A> property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation.Security> and **parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** > is not set in the **parameterReference tag is not supported!!!!** > , audit events will not be written to the Security log. No failure is returned, but audit entries will not be written to the Security log. In addition, the calling thread must have **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** > to be able to write to the Security log.
## Default Dependent on Operating System When setting the property to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation.Default> value, the operating system determines which log will actually be written to. For more information, see [Auditing Security Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/5633f61c-a3c9-40dd-8070-1c373b66a716).
## 例 The following example sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceSecurityAuditBehavior.AuditLogLocation%2A> property to one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation> values.
[!code-csharp[AuditingSecurityEvents\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/cs/auditingsecurityevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AuditingSecurityEvents\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/auditingsecurityevents/vb/auditingsecurityevents.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation Application = int32(1)

Docs.summary: イベント ログ内のアプリケーション ログを指定します。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation Default = int32(0)

Docs.summary: 既定の場所を指定します。これは、オペレーティング システムによって決定されます。 セキュリティ ログへの書き込みがサポートされている場合 \(たとえば Windows Vista、Windows Server 2003、以降のプラットフォームの場合\)、既定のログの場所はセキュリティ ログになります。 それ以外 \(Windows XP SP2 など\) の場合、既定のログの場所はアプリケーション ログになります。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.AuditLogLocation Security = int32(2)

Docs.summary: イベント ログにセキュリティ ログを指定します。 呼び出し元のスレッドは、 をセキュリティ ログに書き込めるようにしておく必要があります。
